name: Don't talk To Strangers (Blockhead Manic)
description:
THIS IS ONLY A PROTOTYPE 

I DIDN'T GET TIME TO FINISH MOST OF IT SO THERE WILL BE MORE UPDATES DURING THE VOTING PRIOD(APRIL 4 - 6) 

There will be also a browser play later on

Story:

At the dead of night you leave the party that you went to without asking. Now you have to get home before your mom finds out but watch out for danger out in the darkness...

HOW TO PLAY:

use WASD or Arrow keys to move around

Find home before the timer runs out.

be careful of taking short cuts through the dark area for who knows what's waiting there...

Made by: blockhead manic
Blockhead Manic - itch.io

made for the mini jam # 103 - darkness
